The reason that golems, giant skeletons, and towers
can't be hybridised in your theoretical system is that
they're unhireable, yes? If there WERE some way of
adding them to your team, the hybrid possibilities are
endless. Imagine this: a soldier/tower combo, where
the tower appears in one of the "Team Member" boxes at
the start of the stage. The soldier (or other
character class, it doesn't matter) can foray out of
the tower and seek out the enemy, but if hard pressed
could retreat back into the tower for defense. While
the soldier is out, the tower has little or no attack
power; while he's in it, the tower has high defense
and special attacks (I'm still in favour of a "boiling
oil" special that would harm all enemies adjacent to
the tower).

Or how about a golem mage? That would be excellent.

Has anyone done any work on a new tile set for the
giant skeleton? Does the program need a patch if the
new tile set is to have forward-facing and
backward-facing tiles that actually work?
     -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.
